articles.title: PM Modi welcomed by diaspora amid ‘Vande Mataram’ chants at J'burg hotel - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Johannesburg in South Africa, where he will attend the BRICS summit. | Latest News India
articles.content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi was accorded a grand welcome by the members of Indian diaspora at Johannesburg in South Africa.
In a video shared by news agency ANI, PM Modi is seen shaking hands with … [+2124 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Wagner Group Prigozhin chief posts first video since failed Russian mutiny, hints he is in Africa - New York Post
articles.description: Russian mercenary chief Yevgeny Prigozhin posted his first video address since leading a short-lived mutiny in late June, appearing in a social media clip that he suggested was shot in Africa.
articles.content:

articles.title: Algeria refuses French request to fly over its airspace for military operation in Niger - Arab News
articles.description: DUBAI: Algeria has refused a French request to fly over its airspace for a military operation in Niger, state radio said late on Monday, after a July 26 coup in the West African nation that lies south of the Algerian border. Algeria opposes any foreign milita…
